cards.title: Nagual
powers: Discard three cards. If you do, you may put a card from your trash into play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.

openingLines.default: I am the protector of the weak. Prepare for defeat!

cards.title: Cleft Mask
body: At the end of your turn, {NagualCharacter} may deal himself 3 psychic damage. If no damage is taken this way, destroy this card.
powers: Draw 3 cards. You may discard any number of cards. Nagual deals a target X radiant damage, where X = the number of cards discarded this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Abeulo poured his soul into creating this mask. I wear it only when the need is most dire.

cards.title: Exhausted Recovery
body: Draw 2 cards.
If {NagualCharacter} has fewer than 10 HP, he regains 3 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Oh, look. The poor pussycat is tired.
I want to see him suffer.

cards.title: Jade Axe
powers: Draw a card or discard a card. {NagualCharacter} deals a target 1 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Carving a piece of jade into an axe is a lost art.

cards.title: Jaguar Pelt
powers: {NagualCharacter} deals a target 2 melee damage. If you have no cards in hand, {NagualCharacter} deals another target 2 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Jaguar has mystical powers.
So, by wearing the pelt I can draw on them?

cards.title: Lashing Claws
body: The first time {NagualCharacter} is dealt damage each turn, if you have no cards in hand, {NagualCharacter} deals a target 2 melee damage.
At the end of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, one player draws a card.

flavorQuotes.text: My people suffered at your hands, now suffer at [b]mine![/b]

cards.title: Moonlight Dance
body: If you have no cards in hand, increase melee damage dealt by {NagualCharacter} by 1.
powers: Discard up to 3 cards. {NagualCharacter} deals 1 target X melee damage, where X = the number of cards discarded this way plus 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Our tonal animals are always within us; with a channeling dance, I let mine free.

cards.title: Pounce
body: {NagualCharacter} deals a target 2 melee damage. Reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: I told you that burning the fields would work. Those farmers have all run away.

cards.title: Predator's Camouflage
body: Whenever {NagualCharacter} would be dealt damage, you may discard a card. If you do, reduce that damage by 1.
If you have no cards in hand, reduce damage dealt to {NagualCharacter} by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Can’t wait to get out of this god-forsaken swamp.
Did you hear that?

cards.title: Pride and Ferocity
body: {NagualCharacter} deals a target 2 radiant damage. If a hero was dealt damage this way, that hero's player may draw 2 cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Who, and what you are will be proved when struggles come.

cards.title: Prowl Unseen
body: Reveal the top two cards of the villain deck. Put 1 of them on top of the deck and the other on the bottom.
You may draw a card or play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Come Jose, you must learn to embrace the shadows.

cards.title: Replenished by Rain
body: At the end of your turn, if you have no cards in hand, {NagualCharacter} regains 1 HP. Otherwise, you may discard a card and {NagualCharacter} deals a target 2 radiant damage.

flavorQuotes.text: The storms are not to be feared, for with the rain comes rebirth, regrowth, and renewal.

cards.title: Rising Strength
body: At the end of your turn, you may put a card from your hand under this card.
powers: Nagual deals himself and each non-hero target X melee damage, where X = the number of cards under this card. Put all cards under this card into your hand. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: As I diminish in power the beast within rises up.

cards.title: Scour the Land
body: Destroy an environment card.
{NagualCharacter} deals 1 target 2 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: How do you know this terrain so well?
I wandered the rainforest as a feral beast.

cards.title: Shaman's Calendar
body: You may skip your draw phase. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, then either put it into play or discard it.

flavorQuotes.text: Studying the stars will help you predict the future, and predicting the future can help you change it.

cards.title: Shapeshifting
body: If you have no cards in hand, draw 3 cards.

Otherwise, discard any number of cards. Reveal cards from your deck until X Ongoing cards are revealed, where X = the number of cards you discarded. Put one of them into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Meow! Is that something I could learn? I’ve got a few minutes before class!
Mastery took years of focus, and practice.

cards.title: Vicious Teeth
body: At the end of your turn, if you have no cards in hand, {NagualCharacter} deals a target 2 melee damage. Otherwise, you may discard up to 3 cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Jose, what makes the jaguar so dangerous?
Jaguars are so deadly because they are able to approach unseen and then strike.
